holidays.title: National Hug a Musician Day
holidays.description: A lot of work goes into being a musician, and not everyone's aware of it.

holidays.title: National Pupusa Day
holidays.description: Hearing of National Pupusa Day for the first time? You are in for a tasty treat.

holidays.title: World Kindness Day
holidays.description: Smile at strangers on the bus or compliment your coworker — the day is yours to make delightful!

holidays.title: Day of Mourning
holidays.description: Honor those claimed by war and tyranny on the National Day of Mourning.

holidays.title: International Tongue Twister Day
holidays.description: We’re not talking about rolling or curling your taste-tester.

holidays.title: National Indian Pudding Day
holidays.description: Sieve your cornmeal and molasses, gather eggs, apples, and milk, and celebrate this native dessert.

holidays.title: Orphan Sunday
holidays.description: Take a stand with people around the world as we shower love on orphans.

holidays.title: Remembrance Sunday
holidays.description: We celebrate fallen war soldiers and their brave acts, which we will never forget.

holidays.title: Sadie Hawkins Day
holidays.description: Women become the pursuers of their crushes and ask men out for a change.

holidays.title: Symphonic Metal Day
holidays.description: Get your gear ready to rock as we get into all things symphonic metal!

holidays.title: Aryan Khan’s Birthday
holidays.description: Coming from a high-profile family, he has been living under the spotlight since birth.

holidays.title: FGTeeV Mike’s Birthday
holidays.description: The creativity he provides for his audience may pave the way for his future success.

holidays.title: Gerard Butler’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is super talented; an actor in his own league with a captivating voice.

holidays.title: Heather B’s Birthday
holidays.description: This extraordinary female rapper has become renowned in the music and entertainment world.

holidays.title: Jimmy Kimmel’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s give an encore to this iconic T.V. personality, comedian, actor, and producer.

holidays.title: Jordan Bridges’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jordan Bridges, the dashing and gifted actor, is one of the best in Hollywood.

holidays.title: Julia Michaels’s Birthday
holidays.description: Julia Michaels sings like a dream, and you can't blame those who love her music!

holidays.title: Justin Laboy’s Birthday
holidays.description: His words and online appearances have made him an entertaining inspiration to people worldwide.

holidays.title: Kelly Cutrone’s Birthday
holidays.description: There are so many exciting things to know about this American television personality.

holidays.title: Lando Norris’s Birthday
holidays.description: He has a need for speed, a knack for racing, and an unquenchable desire for success.

holidays.title: Matt Bennett’s Birthday
holidays.description: From a teen series to the world, nothing can stop this talented, versatile artist!

holidays.title: Paulie Calafiore’s Birthday
holidays.description: Paulie Calafiore is a successful D.J. From New Jersey to reality T.V. and beyond!

holidays.title: Whoopi Goldberg’s Birthday
holidays.description: Goldberg has had a more than four-decade-long career and has never ceased to amaze her fans.
